page.title: 13Recreation
page.content: The greatest number of the sample study group were interested in gardening(38%). The second largest group (27%) were interested in artistic activities such as painting, flower arranging and various types of needlecraft. Reading(5%) followed by shooting (5%) and riding (4%) reflect the retired and farming communities respectively. 4% atend keep fit clubs or spectator sports outside the region in Kessingland and Lowestoft and 4% attend Bingo sessions once a week in Lowestoft. 3% were interested in walking while others listed writing/typing, choir singing, birdwatching, jigsaw puzzles and swimming.
